languages.text: "Знамения Неумирающего предрекли, что кровь Его паствы разольется по трубам флагмана. И я стану ее частью, сольюсь с ней. Теперь... я понимаю. И вереница прошептанных имен изменников ласкает мой слух".

traits.locale_text: "Знамения Неумирающего предрекли, что кровь Его паствы разольется по трубам флагмана. И я стану ее частью, сольюсь с ней. Теперь... я понимаю. И вереница прошептанных имен изменников ласкает мой слух".

languages.text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."
languages.original_text: "Знамения Неумирающего предрекли, что кровь Его паствы разольется по трубам флагмана. И я стану ее частью, сольюсь с ней. Теперь... я понимаю. И вереница прошептанных имен изменников ласкает мой слух".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes. That I too would join this blood and flow with it. I understand now. The string of whispered names of traitors caresses my hearing."

"The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes. That I too would join this blood and flow with it. I understand now. The string of whispered names of traitors caresses my hearing."

"The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it. I understand now. The string of whispered traitors' names caresses my hearing."

"The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

"The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

"The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

languages.text: "Die Omen des Todlosen prophezeiten, dass das Blut Seiner Jünger die Rohre des Flaggschiffs fluten würde ... und dass auch ich mit diesem Blut fließen würde ... Jetzt verstehe ich es. Er flüstert mir etwas zu und die Namen von Verrätern umschmeicheln mein Ohr."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

traits.locale_text: "Die Omen des Todlosen prophezeiten, dass das Blut Seiner Jünger die Rohre des Flaggschiffs fluten würde ... und dass auch ich mit diesem Blut fließen würde ... Jetzt verstehe ich es. Er flüstert mir etwas zu und die Namen von Verrätern umschmeicheln mein Ohr."

languages.text: « Les présages de l'Immortel avaient annoncé que le sang de Ses fidèles inonderait les canalisations du vaisseau, et que je rejoindrais moi-même ce flux... Je comprends, maintenant. Les noms des traîtres qu'Il me chuchote sont comme une douce mélodie à mes oreilles. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

traits.locale_text: « Les présages de l'Immortel avaient annoncé que le sang de Ses fidèles inonderait les canalisations du vaisseau, et que je rejoindrais moi-même ce flux... Je comprends, maintenant. Les noms des traîtres qu'Il me chuchote sont comme une douce mélodie à mes oreilles. »

languages.text: «Los presagios del Inmortal revelaron que la sangre de sus fieles llenaría las tuberías de la nave insignia, y que yo también me uniría a la sangre y fluiría con ella... Ahora lo entiendo. Me susurra y una serie de nombres de traidores acaricia mis oídos».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

traits.locale_text: «Los presagios del Inmortal revelaron que la sangre de sus fieles llenaría las tuberías de la nave insignia, y que yo también me uniría a la sangre y fluiría con ella... Ahora lo entiendo. Me susurra y una serie de nombres de traidores acaricia mis oídos».

languages.text: 「不死の者のお告げによれば、主に忠実な者たちの血が旗艦のパイプに流れる。そして私もその血の一部となり流れるのだと…今、理解しました。主は私に囁かれ、この裏切り者の名前の羅列が私の聴覚を愛撫しているのです」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者のお告げによれば、主に忠実な者たちの血が旗艦のパイプに流れる。そして私もその血の一部となり流れるのだと…今、理解しました。主は私に囁かれ、この裏切り者の名前の羅列が私の聴覚を愛撫しているのです」

languages.text: “不死之神向我传达了预言，说祂信徒的鲜血将会淹没旗舰的通道，而我也会随着鲜血一起流淌……我现在明白了，这是祂在对我低语。我听到了那些叛乱分子的名字。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神向我传达了预言，说祂信徒的鲜血将会淹没旗舰的通道，而我也会随着鲜血一起流淌……我现在明白了，这是祂在对我低语。我听到了那些叛乱分子的名字。”

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in alametleri, kehanetlerinde sancak gemisinin borularından O'nun inançlılarının kanının akacağını önceden belirtmişti. Ben de bu kana karışıp onunla birlikte akabilirdim... Şimdi anlıyorum. Bana fısıldıyor ve hainlerin adlarıyla bezenen dizeler kulağıma çalınıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One's omens foretold that the blood of His faithful would flood the flagship's pipes — that I too would join this blood and flow with it... I understand now. He whispers to me, and this string of traitors' names caresses my hearing."
